actions.desc: Empowers the weapon of one creature within 30' of it that can hear and see it for 1 min. The first time the target hits with the weapon on a turn deals extra 9 (2d8) radiant. If creature the target hits is a Fiend or Undead it takes 13 (3d8) radiant instead.
